title: Short-Intensive Course for Online Language Education Material Development and Teacher Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and foundational knowledge of language pedagogy
context.additional_context: Course to build language-subject material development skills using LMS and OER (Open Educational Resources) in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Participants can produce two or more types of digital language learning materials by integrating LMS and OER within one week.
Participants can provide feedback on peers' online educational materials using a peer assessment rubric based on three criteria: structure, interactivity, and accessibility.
Participants can understand the digital badge system and acquire/share at least one badge in their personal portfolio upon course completion.

resources: Access to OER (Open Educational Resources) databases

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
